abstract: Food and Drug Administration approves Eli Lilly drug Portrazza to treat patients with advanced squamous non-small cell lung cancer.
lead_paragraph: The agency approved Portrazza, in combination with two forms of chemotherapy, to treat advanced squamous nonsmall cell lung cancer, the most common type.

headline.main: F.D.A. Approves Eli Lilly Drug for Advanced Lung Cancer
headline.print_headline: F.D.A. Approves Eli Lilly Drug for Advanced Lung Cancer

snippet: The agency approved Portrazza, in combination with two forms of chemotherapy, to treat advanced squamous nonsmall cell lung cancer, the most common type.
